HomeHero.description: our agency focuses on two essential aspects in every project: the quality of translation and the speed with which we fulfill our responsibilities towards our clients.

ourMission.title: our mission
ourMission.description1: we are here to make the translation more than just a simple conversion of words
ourMission.description2: we are your trusted partners in the realm of complex and specialized translations

servicesItems.title: translation services
servicesItems.description: accurate and professional translations in various languages and fields

servicesItems.title: localisation
servicesItems.description: essential for global connectivity and the exploration of new markets

servicesItems.title: authorized translation
servicesItems.description: translations performed by translators authorized by the Ministry of Justice

servicesItems.title: interpretation services
servicesItems.description: ensuring effective and accurate communication in various contexts

servicesItems.title: audio-video subtitles
servicesItems.description: translating audio-video subtitles for authentic cinephile experiences

keyBenefits.title: key benefits
keyBenefits.description: the main strengths of TTG are the key benefits that our clients have requested or expected over time

keyBenefitsItems.title: flexibility
keyBenefitsItems.description: flexibility is at the core of our values. we successfully adapt to your requirements, no matter how complex or demanding. we approach and address challenges with confidence.

keyBenefitsItems.title: timely delivery
keyBenefitsItems.description: we take pride in our commitments. we guarantee a quote in less than two hours - feel free to put us to the test!

keyBenefitsItems.title: technology
keyBenefitsItems.description: the use of cutting-edge technologies, such as Project Management tools, CAT Tools, and Translation Memory, enhances efficiency and reduces costs, both for us and our clients.

keyBenefitsItems.title: quality control
keyBenefitsItems.description: within our Quality Assurance (QA) department, dedicated reviewers follow strict guidelines tailored to each project..

aboutUs.title: about us
aboutUs.description1: translate to go (TTG) represents the ideal solution for companies in need of extensive translation services. at TTG, we believe in the powerful impact of words, and we are here to provide you with a diverse range of services, surpassing the limitations of translations.
aboutUs.description2: we distinguish ourselves through our long-term partnerships with law firms, notaries, and legal specialists, ensuring that your firm benefits from all the services it needs

team.title: team
team.description: translate to go is where experience, professionalism, and passion for translations converge. Irina and Elena embarked on this journey with two laptops, a wealth of specialized knowledge in each of their fields of expertise, and the desire to build bridges between languages, cultures, and diverse needs.
